abstract: As I write this, the Dow Jones Industrial Average is down only 130 points. (Now there’s a line I have not often used.) Financial stocks, after opening lower, are now up for the day. And Europe rose nicely. The Fed’s move, contrary to what I feared, has brought in buyers.
lead_paragraph: As I write this, the Dow Jones Industrial Average is down only 130 points. (Now there’s a line I have not often used.) Financial stocks, after opening lower, are now up for the day. And Europe rose nicely. The Fed’s move, contrary to what I feared, has brought in buyers.

headline.main: Davos Keeps Tabs on the Dow
